article_title: Your Views: Political correctness enslaves us to false ideology
article_text:
As America slides into lawlessness, immorality and deception, we look for hopes of reviving our once great nation. Answers begin...

og.description: Political correctness stifles free speech, and debates become one-sided because it changes all rules to favor the Left.
